1.content: Which resident of Beach City gains weight?
1.title: Who going to get fat?

111.content: How does Steven get fat?
111.title: Steven

1111.content:
With the threat from the Diamonds now over, Steven starts to realize how much he slimmed down during his adventures.

With all the fighting and missions he had become more active and had little time to stuff himself like he could before.

Steven missed those days of stuffing himself full of Cookie Cats, donuts from the Big Donut, the fry bits from Beach Citywalk Fries, or pizza from Fish Stew Pizza.

But most of all he missed his chubby belly.

As Steven sat there thinking of the days before, he started to ponder the idea of gaining back his belly and going beyond what he had before and becoming even large than before.

With no more threats to the earth, he didn't see a reason to stay slim.

With all the food place on boardwalk it won't be hard to do.

But also in the back of his mind was a faint little whisper telling him that humans can be consider food too.

He quickly suppresses the whisper, as the idea seems ridicules to him.

So with that Steven ready to start gaining back his lost weight and more, where does he start first?
1111.title: Overeating

choices: The voice come back (Weight gain, vore and height growth)
Steven makes it back to the Temple
Steven too hungry to wait and finds a bench
11111.content:
As Steven pondered about where he want to start his feast at, he began thinking about all those sugar coated and carb loaded donuts at the Big Donut.

It was were his two of his best friends use to work and it's where former Mayor Dewey now works.

Steven had made up his mind and decided to start at the Big Donut.

All Steven could think about was all those delicious donuts, dog-nut, nut-dog, soft pretzel and Sugar Shock Shut Down.

But not the Lion Lickers, nobody likes them and that they do not even look like lions.

Steven walked in to the Big Donut and was greeted by former Mayor Dewey.

"Hello, Universe, how are you today," called out former Mayor Dewey.

"I'm doing pretty good, just a little hungry that's all, Mayor Dewey," replied Steven.

"Oh, Universe, I'm not Mayor any more just call me, Bill." said Bill

"Also since you've saved this city so many times, you can get anything you want to eat, no matter how much you want, for free."

"Free?", asked Steven.

"Yep free, no limits and can be used every time you come in," stated Bill.

Steven couldn't believe what he was hearing, he had a free pass to get as much as he wants when ever he wants.

This was going to help majorly in his plan to gain weight.

While he was thinking that voice in that back of his head came back telling him to think how delicious Bill must taste and how fattening he would be.

Again, Steven, suppressed the thought of eating someone.

"You okay, Universe, you're just starring," said Bill.

"What, oh, sorry just thinking of what I want to get," replied Steve, "And I'm going to get three of everything, except Lion Lickers, nobody likes them and that they do not even look like lions."

"Sure thing, Universe. You must be really hungry to be getting this much food." answered Bill.

"Well, you build up an appetite saving the city," Steven chuckled, as his belly growled thinking of all that food.

About 20 minutes later, Bill, had the ordered bagged up, which came up to be 40 bags in total.

Bill had given Steven a box to carry the bags in.

With that, Steven picked up the box, and head out the door back to the Temple.
11111.title: Big Donut

choices: Steven finally gives into his Mother's whisper
Steven ignores his Mother's whisper and just eats food to gain
111111.content:
While walking back to the Temple, the voice came back again, this time a little bit louder. "Come on Steven, one tasty little human won't hurt," said the voice.

"No," replied Steven. "That's why Homeworld came to earth, they found out that eating humans allowed them to become stronger." said the voice.

"That's not true, Pearl and Garnet don't eat human," said Steven.

"Well, they didn't but the Diamonds did" replied the voice.

"And how would you know that you're just a voice in my head," Steven said with a hint of annoyance.

"Well I should know Steven, I'm your mother." "Mom!" exclaimed Steven.

"Yes, Steve, have you ever wonder why in your vision I was small, but was taller in Pearl's memory?" asked Pink/Rose.

"It never really crossed my mind as to why there was a height difference." replied Steven

"Oh, Steven, trust me once you have one you'll never go back to normal food?" stated Pink/Rose.

What does Steven do?
111111.title: While walking back the voice come back

choices: Steven goes home to digest his donuts
111113.content:
Steven found himself a bench and got to work on the donuts. If he were a normal human, eating forty bags of donuts or roughly one thousand donuts would be physically impossible. But he was a half gem with significant shape shifting powers. Compared to changing his height, stretching out his stomach was something rather easy to get done.

It was hard to stop once he got started, but Steven was stopped by his good friend Peedee. "Hey Peedee!" he shouted through a face full of sugar and jelly. "Want some donuts!" he waved a bag at his friend as his rumbling stomach threatened to rip through his sweat pants.

Peedee gulped as he looked at his friend after having torn through roughly seven hundred donuts. The powdered sugar spread all over his customary pink t-shirt and sphere of a belly hard as a rock. "I'm okay, Steven."

"Aww, some share," Steven urged, "Food is better shared."

"okay," Peedee reluctantly said. Taking a donut for himself he eyed Steven's belly again. Unable to take his eyes, off, Steven didn't seem to notice.

The pair said nothing, as Peedee ended up mechanically eating a dozen donuts and Steven ate a few hundred more. "Are you gaining weight for something?"

"Nah, a voice in my head told me to eat people so I figured donuts were better," Steven answered brightly.

"Your life is weird," Peedee responded.

steven looked down, sad, "Yeah. Honestly I still wish we were back to our days playing on the coin rides." His stomach rumbled.

Almost on reflex, Peedee began to rub Steven's beechball belly. "We can't go back, but we can still be friends. Also please I don't want connie to beat me up." He added ,blushing.

Steven leaned back his head, "It's fine, I'll talk to her."
111113.title: Steven too hungry to wait and finds a bench

1111132.content:
For about 2 minutes the boys sat on the bench, peedee continuing to caress Stevens stomach.

After about two or three minutes of this steven finished off the remaining donuts in the bag unable to move from the meal, he now filled up most of the room on the bench.

Peedee was unsure whether he should spend the last of his money on food for steven or if he should stay with Steven.

Peedee, after a moment of silence walks into the big donut and begins to order hundreds upon hundreds of donuts. Knowing that Steven doesn't like wasting food, Peedee walks out holding two trays full of donut bags.

As this was such a big order, Steven sat outside patiently for peedee to return. He takes one small peek at his shirt, to find it half way up his stomach, Steven unaware of how large he had gotten

Peedee returns to steven holding two trays of donut bags and offers to walk steven home, as peedee walks to the metal mesh door, Steven hold the door open for peedee.

Steven and peedee go to Steven's bed with peedee at the lower end sitting up and steven laying down to rest. Peedee begins slowly and gently feeding steven a few donuts, while rubbing his concrete-like belly. Steven asks him why he is feeding him more. Peedee responds with. '' well, I bought them for me, but... I thought Id share them you"
Stevens shrugs this off and continues to endulge. Steven begins to drift off and peedee, now tired after feeding steven falls asleep too.

Early in the morning, Steven wakes up to peedee serving breakfast, Steven sits up in his bed as peedee places the plates on Stevens stomach, now grown larger after the donut binge. Peedee begins to feed steven, Steven wasn't prepared for his feeling towards him, after the meal steven and peedee sit Down on the couch. Peedee turns towards steven and says
"so, how long have you liked me?"
Steven replies "I, I don't know.... Not long I think."
"it's OK, i haven't liked liked you Like this.... until a few days ago."
"i-"
Steven is cut off by the soft lips of peedee kissing him, Steven had never experienced anything like this, he felt like the whole world dissappeared. But then, just to ruin the moment, his stomach growled. Peedee took this as a good sign and begun to kiss more, until he practically wrapped himself around Stevens stomach.

Just then peedee was Interrupted by his phone, he looks down to see an alarm.
He was supposed to be at work 10 minutes ago
Peedee.....
1111132.title: keep eating with Peedee

11111321.content:
Peedee presses the decline button, Peedee helps steven sit up and tells him to stay put. Peedee runs over to stevens fridge and swings it open, grabbing as much as he could fit onto a plate, then running back over to steven.
Steven tells Peedee that he's almost full, Peedee grabs the biggest slice of cake and pushes it into stevens mouth, steven attempting to fight it, slips down off the couch, Peedee. Who was sat on stevens stomach, falling with him. Steven gem began to glow, Peedee, who was sat on stevens gem, looked down and moved out of the way stevens stomach grew by a few centimetres and then shrunk back down to what it was before his gem started to glow.
Peedee questioned steven on what happened, but steven inturupted and shovelled food into his mouth desperately. Peedee begun to understand, stevens gem emptied his stomach, Peedee quickly began helping steven, once steven became full, Peedee asked steven if he should keep feeding steven.
Steven questioned himself, as recently he has had to much control over his life, he liked the feeling of being out of control as it reminded him of when he was younger. He noded and in an instant was being fed more.

After about 15mins of feeding, steven had grown to about 6'3 and his stomach alone weighed around 140lbs. Peedee, astounded by Stevens size, place one more treat into Stevens mouth, just then steven felt a movement. In his pants. Peedee hugged steven tight and. Suddenly stevens button popped. Steven didn't realize how big he'd gotten until now
11111321.title: Stays

choices: Steven decides to go swimming with peedee
tell everyone about their new relationship
111113211.content:
Steven looked around himself and took himself in. His gem glowed, speeding up the digestion of the food in him. In the process, it fast tracked all the flab that he should have put on.

By now he no longer fit in with the shorty squad, except for the spiritual sense. Crammed into his old clothes, the young boy had changed into a towering figure who was a figure of obesity. With his giant posterior and heavy belly, Steven resembled some kind of ancient fertility goddess except he was a guy.

"I love you," Peedee said with watery eyes.

Steven started to weep, "I love you, Peedee," He took in his friend for a giant hug.

By now, his shirt was so small it looked more like a crop top, so Peedee was squished into a heavy set of man boobs and a giant sized belly that now split into two rolls, one larger one slightly less larger.

Every movement caused Steven to wobble and jiggle, Peedee adored it. "What about Connie?" he ventured.

Steven sniffed and wiped his eyes, "I'll tell her. She's my jam bud but you can be my salt wife."

"Salt wife?" Peedee was confused as he struggled not to bury his face in the Steven's flabby form.

"It's from Song of Fire and Ice, where viking type guys would kidnap woman and make them their wives," he frowned, "Maybe that's not what you are."

"You can kidnap me and make me your wife," Peedee said in a husky voice.
111113211.title: *gem glows*

11121.content:
As steven walked down the boardwalk, he noticed that the big donut was opening earlier than usual, steven was extatic, he never gets to go in the big donut this early.
steven walked through the door, looking around for lars or sadie. But he saw no-one around.
Steven peeked around into the backroom to see lars at the back wall grabbing boxes of donuts. Steven asked lars why he opened the shop this early.
Lars shrugged and replied "I don't know"
Steven just accepted this and stepped further in to the room. Lars reaches through a box and offers steven one of the donuts. Steven accepts and begins to indulge into the donut, lars continually asks whether Steven wanted to try a 'new' type of donut, after steven accepts, over and over again, he finally begins to get up, and like a reflex action lars abruptly stops steven, grabbing his pudgy arm,"wait!" steven turns and looks at lars, lars shoves a few donut into stevens mouth steven unexpectedly likes it. Lars, now blushing, continues to feed steven donuts.
Stevens belly begins to grow larger and larger, his shirt ripping around his arms. And streaching the bottom of the shirt

Lars...
11121.title: Friend

1113.content: One day, Steven and Connie were walking to her house. When they got there Connie went to the bathroom. This was Steven's chance to look in connie' s room. It was an average room with a twin sized bed, a desk and a dresser. Steven looked at the desk and saw pictures of fat boys. The boys were a couple hundred pound bigger than Steven. Then he realized that she liked fat boys. So when Connie came back from the bathroom, steven...
1113.title: Connie liked gay boys.

112.content: How does Lars get fat?
112.title: Lars

113.content: How does Ronaldo get fat?
113.title: Ronaldo

1132.content:
After the new years eve party Ronaldo, instead of going home, begun to walk along the boardwalk, he sees lars and begins to talk to him.
They walk and talk for a bit lars dropping hints towards his attraction to Ronaldo, lars sits down, Ronaldo follows him a sits along with him, they talked for a short while, Ronaldo leans in for a kiss, both of their lips touch.
Suddenly lars hears footsteps from around the corner. Pulling away quickly
Lars whispered into Ronaldo ear and both of them run off to lars' home.
Once upstairs lars runs off downstairs. While lars is downstairs Ronaldo takes off his shorts as they seemed tighter than usual. Lars returns, suprised by lack of pants, but intrigued. Lars begins to feed Ronaldo small treats that he had baked the previous week.
Ronaldo willingly let's him, but was curious to why he was being fed. Lars' smirk widened along with a slight movement in his pants. Ronaldo noticed this and pulls in lars for a kiss. Lars accepts it and goes all in, taking off his shirt and pants. Lars' bulge now resting on top of Ronaldo's shirt. Ronaldo begins to change his tone too. Both now have boners.
Lars leans away and sits on top of Ronaldo continuing to feed him. While doing this lars feels a slight bump underneath him, moving away he reveals a stray button...
Now Ronaldo's stomach was the size of an average beachball, his shirt streached and a lot of fat leaking through the bottom of his shirt. Lars pushes Ronaldo's stomach wrapping himself around the ocean of fat. Ronaldo, in retalliation grabs lars' butt.
1132.title: Force Feed

114.content: How does Greg get fat?
114.title: Greg

1141.content:
Greg woke up in his van as usual, leaning up bumping his head against the metal roof.
As he sat up he felt his stomach rumble, he leans forward to grab a pack of chaaps at the end of his van, his large stomach getting in the way. As Greg pats his stomach, reminding him of his slim phisique that he had once in the past. Just then he sees through the window his son, running to the van at almost light speed. Steven swings open the door to show him what he had received for his 15th birthday. Greg is handed the box, as steven runs off to grab more boxes. Greg takes a peek into the box to descover a box full of sweets and donuts of all-sorts. He looks around to ensure his son is not in range, and takes one of the donuts out of the box, swiftly eating it. Once his son return he kept looking through the boxes and taking one or two treats out and then placing the boxes to the side.
Steven, delivering the final 13th box, then proceeded to ask his farther how the treats are. Greg responds nervously "what t-treat" steven looks at his dad and responds "the ones I gave you" Greg looks at the first box he had taken for his son, and on the side it read "to dad, thanks for being there for me every year, take these treats that I got for my birthday as I think you might like them better than me!" Greg looks at his son and smile, Greg gestures steven back to the temple to celebrate his birthday.
Once gone Greg searches through the boxes taking whatever he can find stuffing his face full of chocolate and sweets.
Greg's stomach begins to peek under his shirt, allowing his belly button to see the sunlight. Greg, now sweating from the vans heat, begins eating the half mealted foods to prevent them from being waisted.
Even though he was full, he couldn't let his son down, waisting his gifts. There's a knock on the door Greg peers through the window to descover lars, Greg puts his head round the door and questions him being there.
Lars replied "Stevens party is happening later, and I gotta tell everyone. It will be a the big donut at 5pm" Greg nodes
1141.title: Overeating

11412.content:
Greg chooses to stay, he knows that Steven wouldn't mind him not showing up or being late. Steven was used to it.
Greg continued stuffing the chocolates into his mouth.
Gregs stomach growing outwards to the size of an oversized beachball, his belly growing under the shirt he was wearing.
He continued to stuff himself, while doing so he noticed a shadow approaching. He opens the door...

Lars was stood there, blushing at the sight of Gregs bulging stomach. Lars was astounded at his belly. Greg blushes back and attempts to pull his shirt down, it springing back up over his belly. Lars, still blushing, snapping himself back to reality. Questions Greg whether he was going to Stevens party.
Greg replies to lars with "wait, what! What time is it!" he does this to pretend to not know what time it is lars let's him know and Greg respond by telling lars to let steven know, he can't show up.
Lars agrees, and Greg returns to endulging himself his stomach growing with each bite
Greg became imoblie by the treats he ate, unable to sit up properly. Once up, he tried to get up and out of the van. Then he
11412.title: Does he stay

1151.content: How does Harold get fat?
1151.title: Harold Smiley

121.content: How does Connie get fat?
121.title: Connie

choices: She is happy Steven likes her new flab and decides to get fatter herself
She is happy and wants Steven to help her get fat
She is disgusted and runs off to cry
1211.content:
It had been a month since the accident during sword practice. Connie had fallen and broken her leg during a complicated move Pearl was very apologetic but her parents forbid her from practicing until it was fully healed and her mum being a doctor wanted her leg to heal naturally without using Steven’s power. Connie was still allowed to play with Steven but they had to be careful and not run around like they usually would.

Because of this Connie had started to notice a few
changes. Her once flat stomach now stuck out a little over the waist band not too much to be concerned about. Yet. Also she seemed to get out of breath faster than she used to but that was because she hadn’t been active for a month.

She was feeling a little down about her extra weight so she called Steven and then meet up on the beach. Steven had always been a chubby child but since going on his adventures with the gems he had slimmed down a bit. Steven told Connie about his latest adventure and how cool it was. Then Connie changed the subject to her weight.

“Steven do you think I still look ok even though I’m a bit pudgy now” Connie asked.
“Connie I think you look even better now that your a bit squishy. Your starting to feel like a marshmallow” said Steven smiling.

Connie was shocked!

How does she react?:
1211.title: Be careful!

choices: She wakes up for a midnight snack
She wakes up in the morning and has a big breakfast
12111.content:
“Wow really you think it’s cute” said Connie “Yep” said Steven. Connie was very surprised. They continued on their conversation for a while but then she had to go home. On her way home she sat down on a bench and thought about what Steven had said. He really did seem like he was being honest when he said he would like her bigger. She began to form a plan in her mind. Her parents would be away for the next few weeks meaning she had plenty of time to gain a big round belly before they got back.

Suddenly her stomach rumbled almost as if it was agreeing to her plan. She decided why not start now some pizzas sounded nice so away she went. A few minutes later she emerged from fish stew pizza with 3 extra large cheesy pizzas and a large bottle of pop. She walked home as fast as she could and sat down at her table and prepared to start her feast.

She opened the first box enjoying the glorious smell of cheesy wedge of fatty pizza. She scoffed down the first pizza with no problems. She enjoyed the feeling of the warm food filling her belly she started the second pizza the first few slices went down fine but about half way through she began to struggle. No she thought I must finish all of them. She stuffed the last pieces in causing her stomach to burst through her belt. It spilled forward covering the tops of her now chubby legs. She sighed that felt better. She started her last pizza each slice was bit more painful than the last her stomach was stretched further than ever before it cover nearly all of her chunky thighs. She groaned as she stretched to grab the bottle of pop her belly squishing into her legs it felt warm but quite hard due to all of the food. Her top couldn’t even reach the top half of her round stomach it was just rolled up revealing Connie’s growing ball of fat. She unscrewed the lid of the bottle and held it to her mouth. The fizzy liquid sloshed down into her already stuffed belly forcing it out another few inches. When it was down she dropped the bottle to the floor and began to rub her massive stomach. She loved how it felt a giant warm ball of jiggle fat. She definitely was no longer just pudgy she reckoned when all of the food had been digested she would have a decent layer of fat to play with. After massaging her new stomach and slowly tidying up her mess Connie decided to call it a day and go to bed. She stretched her pjs over her big round belly as much as she could then went to sleep stroking her new fat.


What happens next?:
12111.title: The start of something big

choices: Pearl agrees to help. It is for love after all
Pearl scolds her student for throwing away her hard work
121112.content:
It wasn't the sunshine hitting her face or the birds singing just outside her window that woke Connie up, but the rumbling of her fatter stomach, something she felt proud of since it meant that her appetite was increasing and with that her waistline.

Getting up was a bit of a struggle as Connie wasn't used to massive meals just yet. After lazily deciding to save changing out of her PJs until after breakfast, she trudged her way downstairs, giddily noting how her thighs brushed slightly along the way.

A quick glance through the kitchen and Connie was preparing bacon, sausages, eggs and some cinnamon rolls that her mother kept in case of an extremely stressful day. "I better replace them before they get back or she'll have a bigger cow over how much of a pig I'm being."

Setting the table took longer than she liked, but it was finally time to dig in. Until she heard a roar followed by someone knocking on her door. "Hello? Connie? Your parents insisted that I check on you while they are away. They even gave me a key."

Crud! It was Pearl! Connie couldn't possibly hide the evidence of her decision nor hide fast enough. She probably couldn't even fit in her usual spots anyway.

As her mentor entered the kitchen, Connie felt fear at the look of shock upon her face. "Wait! I can explain!" Pearl crossed her arms and listened as Connie retold the conversation that she had with Steven, the decision that she reached and how she was enjoying the extra mass. Pearl listened, letting out a sigh at the end. "Connie...
121112.title: She wakes up in the morning and has a big break...

choices: Time-skip to a week under Pearl's care
1211121.content:
Normally I don't condone such brash decisions, but I know what it's like to do just about anything for love." Connie was relieved to hear that Pearl understood, but she had to ask "So you're not going to try and stop me?" Pearl didn't immediately answer, instead she went over the the kitchen and began cleaning the dishes.

"Seeing as this is for love, especially to court Steven, then as your teacher I should help you. I'll handle the cooking and cleaning. If Steven is even half the Fat Admirer his father is, then you need to burn as little as possible to get to a size he can't resist."

Connie was awestruck at what Pearl was offering. It was only when Pearl placed a half gallon of whole milk in front of her that she snapped out of it. "Don't just sit there! Eat up so I can start on lunch!" "Yes Ma'am!"
1211121.title: Pearl agrees to help. It is for love after all

choices: They play a video game and eat snacks
12112.content:
“You really think I look good being chubby” Connie said. “Yes of course I think you would look even better if you were a bit bigger too” said Steven cheerfully.
“ Well if you really think so let’s go get some donuts and see how much I can add to this!” Connie said wiggling her pudge.”Yay!” Said Steven “Let’s go”.

“Hi Sadie 15 of the chocolate donuts and 5 bottles of pop please” said Steven. “Sure are you having a party?” Replied Sadie “Of sorts” said Steven looking at Connie and giggling a little. “Well have fun” said Sadie handing over the donuts and the drinks.

Steven and Connie headed back towards the beach and found a nice quite spot where Connie could begin her feast.

Her first few donuts went down fine. But after 7 donuts and 2 bottles of pop Connie was starting to feel pretty full. Her stomach was starting to push up her T-shirt revealing plump round ball of fat. She continued to eat another 5 donuts and drink another pop. Her belly was now half revealed by her T-shirt it was hard and no longer wobbled when poked. “ I can’t eat anymore Steven” Connie said in a slightly pained voice. “I think you can” said Steven “I’ll help you”. Steven held up another donut to connives mouth and she slowly ate it and another and another. Then Steven made her drink another bottle of pop she could feel it slosh down into her stuffed stomach which was now straining against the waist of her trousers so much she thought they would rip.

“I’m really full I’m done for now” Connie panted her stomach as hard as a rock. “Ok” said Steven who was now massaging Connies belly gently. “That feels nice” she sighed. Connie thought about what her parents would say if they saw her like this they definitely wouldn’t like her decision to gain weight she had always been their healthy little girl. “ Hey Steven can I stay at your house for a while my parents won’t be very happy if they see me like this” asked Connie “Of course you can” said Steven happily “I can help you get even bigger while you are there”.

After Steven had drank the finale bottle of pop and Connie’s stomach had calmed down a bit after being stuffed to the brim they slowly start to walk to the temple. When they got there the gems weren’t there but Pearl had left a note and a envelope of money “Hi Steven we had to go a dangerous gem creature has been spotted. There is some snacks in the kitchen and I left you some money I hope it’s enough so you can get one of those fish stew pizzas that you like be safe from Pearl”.

“Cool we can get at leat 3 pizzas with the money we have” said Steven “That would be great” Connie replied.

What do they do now?:
12112.title: Really!?!

choices: Steven - He wants her to be fat
Pearl - For an experiment on humans
1212.content: Who wants to force feed Connie and why?
1212.title: Who by?

122.content: How does Sadie get fat?
122.title: Sadie

12221.content: Does Lars cook her a meal or feeds her everything in the Big Donut?
12221.title: Lars

123.content: How does Amethyst get fat?
123.title: Amethyst

1231.content:
Amethyst had always been the chunkiest of the gems. She was the only one who ate human food regularly and really enjoyed it. This plus the fact she was in the ground for too long had lead to her being a bit pudgy around the middle.

One day while walking around beach city she saw some flyers posted up on the side of the pizza shop. The flyers read: “Are ready to show food what you can do? Enter the eating contest today on the beach at 3 o’clock!” “That sounds like fun!” Amethyst said checking the time. It was only 1 o’clock so she had a whole 2 hours to practice eating. She decided that she should start with pizza as that would be easiest.

She walked in and asked for 10 whole pizzas with extra cheese and 3 four litre bottles of coke. After a while she came out with a tall stack of boxes with the bottles of coke on top. She found a nice bit of shade on the street to start her practice.

She grabbed the first pizza and folded it up and swallowed it whole after that she ate though another one and another one. Her belly started to stick out. “Cool” she said the watched it grow further as she downed her first 4 litres. She continued to stuff another 3 pizzas down followed by her second bottle her stomach sticking out more and more over her chubby thighs that were starting to spill over the ground. She continued to stuff her last 4 pizzas into her belly that grew out another roll to cope with the large amount of food being shoved in to fast. She finished off with the final bottle that pushed her fat stomach out another few centimetres. She burped and tried to get up but she fell causing her new layer of fat to jiggle around her. “Wow this feels so good” said Amethyst poking her big belly it felt soft and squishy. “ I can’t wait till I get to eat all the food at the contest!”

After another few attempts she managed to get to her feet that she now couldn’t see due to her bulging stomach. She checked the time again it was now 2 o’clock. “What should I do now?” pondered Amethyst rubbing the round ball of fat that was her belly.



What should she do?:
1231.title: Food, food and more food!

124.content: How does Pearl get fat?
124.title: Pearl

choices: Rose wants Greg to lick her armpits
Rose wants to sit on Greg's face
12531.content:
(Chapter carried over from Steven Universe slob/wg/gts)

Rose Quartz was always fascinated by the humans and their way of life. The way they ran about with their busy schedules, stopping at fast food resturaunts as they darted around Beach City. She was even more fascinated by their slow shapeshifting. Her dear husband, Greg, had grown slightly larger around the midsection since she first met Mr. Universe. She noted that over time, her love for him increased along with his weight, so perhaps size in human culture is equated with love?

It was a cool spring afternoon as Greg and Rose sat contentedly on a towel on the beach. Greg was enjoying his favorite snack, a hot dog, while snuggling up with his much larger wife.

"Why do you enjoy hot dogs, Greg?" Rose inquired. Greg was caught off guard for a moment before responding.

"Well, uh, I guess I'm not sure. They're convenient and tasty I guess."

"And do they make you larger?" Greg blushed at the question. Was he getting fat? He decided to not to worry too much about the implications of the question.

"I suppose I have gained a little bit of weight, yeah." Rose smiled and hugged her lover tighter.

"That's good to know, thank you, Greg." Rose held her husband and began to imagine all the ways she could make him love her more.

---

The hot summer sun bore down on Greg as he made the finishing touches on the mayor's truck. The vehicle glittered in the sun as the water began to dry. It had been a month since Greg saw Rose. She told him that she had an important mission with the Crystal Gems to fulfill, but Greg was worried and missed his wife. After the mayor came and picked up his truck, Greg went to his office and noticed a note.

"Dearest Greg,

Come to the temple, I have a surprise for you.

Your loving wife,
Rose"

Greg blushed as he imagined what the surprise could be. He closed the car wash early and rushed to the temple to see his wife. He climbed the steps and noted a very... distinct... odor coming from inside the house.

Greg was positively shocked as he stepped inside. Rose Quartz sat naked on the couch, easily three times as big as she was when Greg had last seen her. She had always been large, but she now stood a foot taller than before and was substantially wider. Her stomach was segmented into numerous folds while her enormous ass took up most of the couch. The summer heat caused her body to glisten with sweat. Clutched in her hand was a hot dog, and next to her was a pile of the things. Greg blushed deeply at the sight of his wife.

"Mr. Universe, come to me and see what your surprise is."
12531.title: Rose and her Human

1311.content: How does Stevonnie get fat?
1311.title: Stevonnie

13113.content:
Stevonnie was hungry.

Stevonnie was being hunted by Rubies on the Jungle moon.

Stevonnie was going to kill two birds with one stone.

Truth was, they were far too kind to eat the bird blob baby thing.

The rubies had no such protection since they were such angry little bastards.

It didn't help that Navy was among the rubies sent to kill them.

The thing was, three of Navy's comrades were now shoved into Stevonnie's beach ball sized belly. The fusion gulped and gulped as Navy struggled.

the gem winced and tried to bargain, "Hey, I know there's hard feelings about betraying you, but can't you give me a second chance?"

In response, Stevonnie licked her tongue over the Ruby's face and pulled them in with one last gulp. Briefly, Navy's face was pressed against their throat before vanishing.

About four pairs of hands pressed the inside of Stevonnie's belly.

The fusion laughed, "Heck yeah! I didn't even know we could do that?"

Their belly started to rumble, as it began to digest and churn the meal. "Well, gonna lie down for a nap . . . maybe?"

1432.content: How does Lapis and Perridot get fat?
1432.title: Themselves

choices: Lapis and Peridot proceed to eat it all
14321.content:
Peridot couldn't help but feel something was missing from the binge watching experience she and Lapis so thoroughly enjoyed. What could it be? They had an incredibly comfy couch, a nice tv and the complete Camp Pining Hearts collection.

Even more importantly they had each other to enjoy the experience with. It was only after a movie night at Steven's did it click. Snacks. They never had snacks on hand.

Needless to say, Lapis was a bit surprised come their next binge session to find a pile of potato chip bags, some candy bars, a pizza and a few sodas set up for easy access. What was more surprising was how insistent Peridot was about doing this.

"Come on Lap. This is just what we need to really enjoy this. I even made sure the pizza was fish free." Peridot followed up with that bright smile and starry eyes that Lapis found so difficult to resist. "Okay. I'll give it a shot."
14321.title: Overeating

144.content: How does Pearl and the Pink Haired Woman get fat?
144.title: Pearl/Pink Haired Woman

choices: Go to the temple and eat there
1441.content:
Pearl enjoyed her company. While she first turned down the mystery girl, she really wanted her.

Rose was dead. For better or worse. That would not change.

But she had her eyes firmly on the mystery girl, especially her bouncing, full ass.

"Hey Pearl, try some funnel cake." She said.

"Oh no, Sheena," said Pearl , "I don't like eating."

"Have you ever eaten?" Sheena asked.

Pearl blushed teal, "Well no,"

"So try it," she laughed.

Pearl took one bite.

And her road to obesity began.

info.description:
This is set in the world of Steven Universe. It can be set in the canon universe or an alternate universe

General:
- Try to make the chapters long enough instead of adding short chapters
- make the chapters somewhat consistent with the choice previous instead of changing it entirely
- Have fun making up creative events in the story

Allowed:
Weight Gain
Sex (excluding anyone under 18, can be aged up)
Nudity (excluding anyone under 18, can be aged up)
Pregnant
Vore
Height growth
Anything else is fine

Not Allowed:
Scat
Diapers
Gore
Watersports
Death
Futa
Breast Vore
Cock vore

As mentioned before, go ahead and think of anything to add to this story. As long as it in the area that is allowed. Have a good time making this story as long as it can.
